description: Information about the medical tests of a donor.
title: Medical tests
name: medical_tests

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

PFT_method.description: Indicate with which method, spirometry or plethysmography, the pulmonary function was accessed and whether DLCO/KCO testing was performed.

PFT_age.description: Indicate the age of the subject at the time point of pulmonary function parameter assessment in years, if known.

PFT_time_point.description: Indicate at which date the pulmonary function parameters were recorded as DD/MM/YYYY if available. If this information is not shareable, please indicate 'not_shareable'.
PFT_time_point.guidelines: If this information is not shareable, please indicate \'not_shareable\'.

PFT_relative_time_point.user_friendly: Days between collection and Pulmonary Function Test
PFT_relative_time_point.description: If timepoint of sample collection (sample_collection_time_point) and/or timepoint of PFT recording (PFT_time_point) is not available, indicate how many days prior or after sample collection the pulmonary function parameters were assessed if available.

FEV1_predicted.description: Indicate the predicted Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) in milliliters, based on patient age, sex, height, and ethnicity, if available.

FEV1_preBD.description: Indicate the measured FEV1 in milliliters before the administration of a bronchodilator if available.

FEV1_postBD.description: Indicate the measured FEV1 in milliliters after the administration of a bronchodilator if available.

FEV1_preBD_predicted_percent.user_friendly: FEV1 percent of preBD to predicted
FEV1_preBD_predicted_percent.description: Indicate the percentage of the predicted FEV1 achieved before bronchodilator administration if available.

FEV1_postBD_predicted_percent.user_friendly: FEV1 percent of postBD to predicted
FEV1_postBD_predicted_percent.description: Indicate the percentage of the predicted FEV1 achieved after bronchodilator administration if available.

FVC_predicted.description: Indicate the predicted Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) in milliliters, based on patient age, sex, height, and ethnicity, if available.

FVC_preBD.description: Indicate the measured FVC in milliliters before bronchodilator administration if available.

FVC_postBD.description: Indicate the measured FVC in milliliters after bronchodilator administration if available.

FVC_preBD_predicted_percent.user_friendly: FVC percent of preBD to predicted
FVC_preBD_predicted_percent.description: Indicate the percentage of the predicted FVC achieved before bronchodilator administration if available.

FVC_postBD_predicted_percent.user_friendly: FVC percent of postBD to predicted
FVC_postBD_predicted_percent.description: Indicate the percentage of the predicted FVC achieved after bronchodilator administration if available.

FEV1_FVC_ratio_preBD.user_friendly: FEV1 to FVC ratio before bronchodilator
FEV1_FVC_ratio_preBD.description: Indicate the ratio of FEV1 to FVC before bronchodilator administration if available.

FEV1_FVC_ratio_postBD.user_friendly: FEV1 to FVC ratio after bronchodilator
FEV1_FVC_ratio_postBD.description: Indicate the ratio of FEV1 to FVC after bronchodilator administration if available.

FRC_abs.description: Indicate the Functional Residual Capacity (FRC) in absolute milliliters if available.
